title: Life is Feudal: Your Own v0.2.5.1 crack RVTFIX #Kortal
description:
Life is Feudal: Your Own v0.2.5.1
crack; RVTFIX


You need to have steam running (use a new account with no legit games on it)

run yo_cm_client.exe

to open console, press CTRL + ~ (qwerty), ÃƒÂ¹ (azerty), ÃƒÂ¶ (qwerty-german)

To connect to the server Kortal's Area, when on the main menu, press CTRL + J.

to connect to another server, you can use the command [join] in the console:
join1: lif.kortal.org:28000 (kortal-vanilla skillcap 1800)
join2: game.fianna.ru:28000 (fianna-vanilla)

if you host a public server, contact me to add your server address here.

if you want to join a custom server, use this command: joinToRemoteServer(":")

PS: when connecting to a server, if you have the CR_INVALID_VERSION error, it means the 
server you are trying to connect is not up to date ! try another server, or wait it to 
be updated !
